clues.text: The Fatimid Dynasty of North Africa in the 900s A.D. claimed descent from Fatimah, daughter of this prophet

rounds.category: ROAD TRIP TO THE SAME-NAMED PLACE
rounds.comments: (Mike: Give us the name shared by the places each trip starts and ends.)

clues.text: You'll spend a lot of time on I-95 going from Maine to Georgia, maybe to see a major golf tournament

rounds.text: Mimi Reinhard, who never learned to type using more than 2 fingers, produced this with 1,100 names, including hers
